labels.name: epic
labels.value: TC_55!048 | Applied filters 'Region/Sectors' are not displayed after selecting an item from the 'Most traded' dropdown in the 'Live shares prices'  widget on the 'Shares' page

items.statusDetails:
Failed: Bug # 55!048 Expected result: Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': ['Canada', 'Greece', 'Italia', 'Energia', 'ETF-uri'] 
are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: ['Canada', 'Italia']

Failed: Bug # 55!048 Expected result: Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': ['Australia', 'Franța', 'Greece', 'Industriale', 'Tehnologie'] 
are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: ['Australia']

Failed: Bug # 55!048 Expected result: Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': ['Australia', 'Japonia', 'Statele Unite ale Americii', 'Bunuri de consum și servicii neciclice', 'Servicii publice'] 
are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: ['Australia', 'Japonia', 'Statele Unite ale Americii', 'Bunuri de consum și servicii neciclice']

Failed: Bug # 55!048 Expected result: Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': ['Olanda', 'Suedia', 'Elveția', 'Energia', 'Finanțe'] 
are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: []

are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: ['Germania']

are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown,
